titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to treat employees of the Government of the District of Columbia in the same manner as employees of State and local governments are treated for the purposes of the Hatch Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 7/30/1996--Introduced. Amends Federal law to treat District of Columbia employees in the same manner as State and local government employees are treated for the purposes of the Hatch Act.
